'''Beta 1.20.60.26''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.20.60.26''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the seventh and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.60]], released on January 18, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/23284111058701|title=Minecraft - Beta & ''Preview'' 1.20.60.26|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=January 18, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|/me}}, {{cmd|/say}}, {{cmd|/tell}}, and {{cmd|/title}}'''
* Reduced max length for output message to 512 characters.
'''{{cmd|/kill}}'''
* Reduced max length for reason message to 512 characters.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.20.60.26 Preview|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Others'''
*Made various performance and stability improvements.
*Fixed an issue with multiplayer sessions sometimes not appearing in available LAN games.
